name: Beginner's Method
description: Layer-by-layer solving method ideal for learning. Solves the cube in 7 intuitive steps using a small set of easy-to-remember algorithms.

categories.name: White Cross
categories.description: Create a white cross on the bottom layer with matching edge colors

categories.name: White Corners
categories.description: Position and orient all white corners to complete the first layer

categories.name: Middle Layer Edges
categories.description: Insert the four middle layer edges into their correct positions

categories.name: Yellow Cross
categories.description: Create a yellow cross on the top layer

categories.name: Yellow Corner Position
categories.description: Move yellow corners to their correct positions

categories.name: Yellow Corner Orientation
categories.description: Orient the yellow corners to solve the cube
